dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
X. Wang
S. Takaki

dcterms:description: This dataset consists of clean speech collected from 84 speakers, mixed with noise from the DEMAND dataset at various SNR levels to create a challenging environment for speech enhancement tasks.
dcterms:title: VoiceBank + DEMAND

dcterms:creator: J. F. Gemmeke
D. P. W. Ellis
D. Freedman
A. Jansen
W. Lawrence
R. C. Moore
M. Plakal
M. Ritter
dcterms:description: AVSpeech is a large dataset collected from YouTube, containing clean speech segments mixed with noise from the AudioSet dataset, used for evaluating speech enhancement performance.
dcterms:title: AVSpeech + AudioSet
